item.title: Netanyahu Asks Israel’s President to Pardon Him in Corruption Cases
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu made the contentious appeal weeks after President Trump had made the same request to the Israeli president.

item.title: The Shocking Crash That Led Marin County to Reckon With the Dangers of E-Bikes
item.description: Unregulated e-bikes are a growing danger on American streets. In one Bay Area town, a terrible accident finally led to reform.

item.title: What to Know About Honduras’s Elections
item.description: President Trump has put a spotlight on Honduras as voters head to the polls. Their choices include the left-wing party in power and a candidate endors...

item.title: Mamdani, a Sharp Critic of Police Surveillance, Will Soon Oversee It
item.description: Zohran Mamdani, New York’s mayor-elect, has criticized the N.Y.P.D.’s surveillance tactics. He reappointed the police commissioner who helped create a...

item.title: Glenn Close, Ethan Hawke and Others Mourn Tom Stoppard
item.description: Nobody advanced or cherished the English language more than Stoppard, Tim Curry noted. Colleagues and fans agreed.
